name: The Enforcers
description: The three of them have very different personalities, but they are all keepers of justice and make a great team. Firm believers of those who do evil must be punished.

passiveSkill.name: All For One
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When the Enforcers are not in play, every Ally partner of Summon class that joins the battle requires 1 less Energy, increases their ATK by {placeholder}, and HP Max by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Joint Enforcement
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Betty and the Enforcers have arrived. Attack a single enemy and deal ATK * {placeholder} damage. Vanessa and Lucy inherit {placeholder} of Betty's ATK, {placeholder} of her DEF, and {placeholder} of her HP. The 3 of them gain [Life Link]. Vanessa taunts the enemy team for 2 rounds."}

specialSkill.name: Comment Booster
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "The Enforcers analyze the enemy to find its weakness. Attack a single enemy and deal ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing CRIT Rate by {placeholder} .Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: All Fire
normalSkill.description: The Enforcers aim with their guns. Attack a single enemy and deal ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Betty and the Enforcers have arrived. Attack a single enemy and deal ATK * {placeholder} damage. Vanessa and Lucy inherit {placeholder} of Betty's ATK, {placeholder} of her DEF, and {placeholder} of her HP. The 3 of them gain [Life Link]. Vanessa taunts the enemy team for 2 rounds.

templateData.lens6.skill: The Enforcers analyze the enemy to find its weakness. Attack a single enemy and deal ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing CRIT Rate by {placeholder} .Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
